thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Dianne Quan

author: Dianne Quan
title: Dianne Quan
text: When Purolite was looking for a serviced office in the Hills District to base their new Australian operation, it was clear from the outset that Servcorp's Norwest Offices were a perfect fit for our requirements with the right corporate ambiance, convenient location and the professional helpful Servcorp staff who could support our small team with the Frontdesk services we needed. Two and half years later this is still true. A small team in a global network can often feel isolated but working at the Norwest offices has given our staff a great sense of being in a larger office community, with Servcorp's team of Receptionists, Secretaries and Office Managers active members of the Purolite team. A great place to base your operation.
